page.title: 07GAMES WE PLAY - SALLY
page.content: The games I play are Cluedo, Ker-plunk and Monopoly. They are my best games. I also play Guess-who. I have some pieces missing on Guess-who. I like playing netball and being Goal-Shooter so I can shoot. I like playing hide and seek and Polo, they are good games. My favourite games are Monopoly and Cluedo. I play these games all the time. Mostly at night, I play Cluedo and Monopoly. The game Ker-plunk is where you put the straws in the holes and then you put the marbles in. And the game Cluedo is where you have to cross out on a piece of paper. Cluedo is easy when you know how. Monopoly is an easy game it is similar to Cluedo. Monopoly you have to go round the board. I play Guess-who with my brother.I nearly win all the time-my brother is no good.
